snippet: The University of Texas-Pan American and the University of Texas at Brownsville are seeking legislative approval to form a new university that would also incorporate a medical school.
lead_paragraph: The University of Texas-Pan American and the University of Texas at Brownsville are seeking legislative approval to form a new university that would also incorporate a medical school.
